trans-unit.source: Defines a class used to retrieve binding assertions in metadata and to attach implementing binding elements at the appropriate scope.

An implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> is passed to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> objects to export and import, respectively, custom policy assertions to and from metadata.
On export, a collection of policy assertions are retrieved in order to add custom assertions.
On import, the assertions are retrieved in order to import specific ones and configure binding elements appropriately.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A> method returns all policy assertions that are for the binding.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetFaultBindingAssertions%2A> method returns all policy assertions for a specific fault message.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A> method returns all policy assertions for a specific message.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> method returns all policy assertions for a specific operation.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.BindingElements%2A> property gets the binding elements for the binding being described or configured.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A> property gets the contract description for which the binding is being described or configured.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"></xref> class using the specified endpoint.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> for the policy context.
Gets a collection of binding elements to which custom binding elements that implement policy assertions are added.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection"></xref> that contains the binding elements for an endpoint.
Gets the contract for the endpoint.
The contract for the endpoint.
Gets a collection of policy assertions from metadata.
The collection returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A> is not a copy.
You can add and remove assertions as necessary.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that contains binding policy assertions.
Returns a collection of policy assertions for the specified SOAP fault.
The collection returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetFaultBindingAssertions%2A> is not a copy.
You can add and remove assertions as necessary.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription"></xref> object for which policy assertions are to be added or for which bindings are to be configured.
A collection of policy assertions for the specified SOAP fault.
Gets a collection of policy assertions for a message.
The collection returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A> is not a copy.
You can add and remove assertions as needed.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription"></xref> for which there are binding assertions.
A collection of policy assertions for the specified message.
Returns a collection of policy assertions for the specified operation.
The collection returned from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> is not a copy.
You can add and remove assertions as necessary.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> object for which policy assertions are to be added or for which bindings are to be configured.
The policy assertions for the operation.
